alert.note: Alert for Northern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 13 at 2:49PM EST until January 15 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulation of 6 to 12 inches near and north of Route 28, although locally higher amounts possible north of Stillwater Reservoir. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Northern Herkimer County. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult due to snow covered roadways and low visibility. Gusty winds will make for blowing and drifting of snowfall.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
